N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 598-6.2 - Initial Response

State Regulations

In response to a release at a facility, the facility must
immediately perform the following initial response actions: (a) identify and mitigate fire, explosion, and vapor hazards; (b) take
immediate action to prevent any further release of hazardous substance; and
(c) report the release to
department's Spill Hotline (800-457-7362) within two hours after
discovery. Notes
